Html: Hi, i just start working with Naudio. Im traing to find something like balance. I need to play 2 wave on different channels. example on left side 100Hz and 115 on right. Can I do this in very simple way? I really need help its for my project in biofeedback.
you need two sginal generators each feeding into a panning sample provider (one panned hard left, one right), then mix the two stereo signals together with a mixing sample provider
